text: is a station on the Hiroden Miyajima Line, located in Sagatahonmachi, Hatsukaichi, Hiroshima. ==Routes== From Sanyo-jogakuen-mae Station, there is one of Hiroden Streetcar routes. *28px Hiroshima Station - Hiroden-miyajima- guchi Route ==Connections== ;█ Miyajima Line :28px ::Rakurakuen — Sanyo- jogakuen-mae — Hiroden-hatsukaichi ==Around station== *Sanyo Women's College *Sanyo girls' junior / senior high school ==History== *Opened as "Sanyo- jogakuen" on December 24, 1950. *Renamed to "Sanyo-joshidai-mae" on April 1, 1963. *Renamed to "Sanyo-jogakuen-mae" on April 1, 2019. ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes ==References== Category:Hiroden Miyajima Line stations Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1950
title: Sanyo-jogakuen-mae Station
